page.title: 10SOCIAL LIFE IN FELMINGHAM
page.content: {The Womens Institute}is an Independant voluntary organisation whose broad purpose is to give country women the opportunity of working together to improve the quality of life in rural areas. Felmingham WI has 28 members who meet monthly in the village Hall with speakers and demonstrations on cookery, art, crafts, sport, etc. {Good Companions,}with 26 members, meets fortnightly for a social afternoon of dominoes,bingo & card games. Originally the joining age was 65, now it is solely for the retired. {Football & Bowls}clubs meet every week and offer recreation & entertainment for the male members of the community of all ages. {Luncheon Club}meets once a month. On average 25 people meet for a 3-course lunch and social gathering in aid of Church funds.
